title.rendered: How to Make Payment Through Bitcoin

content.rendered:
To pay through Bitcoins using your credit / debit card or bank account you have to go to one of these sites and buy Bitcoins then you transfer it to our Bitcoin wallet on site or as stated below.

TO PURCHASE BITCOINS ONLINE SIMPLY GO TO ONE OF THE FOLLOWING SITES :

https://www.bitcoin.com/

Or

https://www.coinbase.com/

Or

https://www.moonpay.com

THIS IS OUR BITCOIN WALLET :

bc1q9n7gwp9gkfsrzt44c59qj8kpyxagu4kvfwtl2f

COPY AND PASTE WHEN SENDING BITCOINS.
